changeSet.author: mdubrovin
changeSet.comment: Update cases with consents for research.

changeSet.author: mdubrovin
changeSet.sql: update paternity_fields join casefile on casefile.paternity_fields_id=paternity_fields.id set paternity_fields.future_research_consent_maternal=NULL, paternity_fields.future_research_consent_child=NULL, paternity_fields.ancillary_maternal_sample=NULL where casefile.id=750181; update paternity_fields join casefile on casefile.paternity_fields_id=paternity_fields.id set paternity_fields.future_research_consent_maternal=1, paternity_fields.future_research_consent_child=1, paternity_fields.ancillary_maternal_sample=0 where casefile.id=1252239;
